<hr />

#####1. What is the rank of the matrix A?
<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>A</mi><mo>=</mo><mfenced open="[" close="]"><mtable><mtr><mtd><mn>1</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>2</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>3</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>4</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>0</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>1</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>3</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mn>0</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>1</mn></mtd><mtd><mo>-</mo><mn>2</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>1</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mn>5</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>4</mn></mtd><mtd><mo>-</mo><mn>2</mn></mtd><mtd><mo>-</mo><mn>3</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable></mfenced></math>


```{r}
A=matrix(c(1,-1,0,5,2,0,1,4,3,1,-2,-2,4,3,1,-3), nrow = 4)
A
print("Rank of matrix A")
qr(A)$rank

```

#####2.  Given an mxn matrix where m > n, what can be the maximum rank? The minimum rank, assuming that the matrix is non-zero?

Maximum possible rank is n.
Minimum possible rank is 1.


#####3. What is the rank of the matrix B?
<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>B</mi><mo>=</mo><mfenced open="[" close="]"><mtable><mtr><mtd><mn>1</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>2</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>1</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mn>3</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>6</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>3</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mn>2</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>4</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>2</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable></mfenced></math>


```{r}
B=matrix(c(1,3,2,2,6,4,1,3,2), nrow = 3)
B
print("Rank of matrix B")
qr(B)$rank

```
